TaskDescription: 128-channel EEG data set acquired from a study of mismatch negativity in the auditory system. The experiment comprised an auditory oddball paradigm in which subjects heard standard (500Hz) and deviant (550Hz) tones, occuring 80% (480 trials) and 20% (120 trials) of the time, respectively, in a pseudo-random sequence subject to the constraint that two deviant tones did not occur together.
